00029 #include <string.h>

00031 NAMESPACE_USE(baci)
00032 
00033 template <class T> class DevIORS232 : public DevIO<T>
00034 {
00035         public:
00036                 DevIORS232(char * dev, SerialRS232::baudrates speed = SerialRS232::b9600, SerialRS232::parities parity = SerialRS232::noparity, SerialRS232::databits databit = SerialRS232::data8, SerialRS232::stopbits stopbit = SerialRS232::stop1, int cend = 10, unsigned int buffer = 1024, int timeout = 300) 
00037                 {
00038                         sp = new SerialRS232(dev, speed, parity, databit, stopbit, cend, buffer, timeout);
00039                         ACS_SHORT_LOG ((LM_DEBUG, "Port opened: %s", dev));
00040                 }
00041                 
00042                 virtual ~DevIORS232() 
00043                 {
00044                         delete sp;
00045                         ACS_SHORT_LOG ((LM_DEBUG, "Port closed"));
00046                 }
00047                 
00048                 virtual bool initalizeValue(){ return true; }
00049                 
00050                 virtual T read(int& errcode, unsigned long long& timestamp)
00051                 {
00052                         const char delimit[]=",\r\n";
00053                         char aux[80];
00054                         char *token;
00055                         char *lectura;
00056                         
00057                         {
00058                         ThreadSyncGuard guard(&m_serialAccessMutex);
00059                         sp->write_RS232("WS");
00060                         sleep(4);
00061                         strcpy(aux, sp->read_RS232());
00062                         }
00063                         token = strtok(aux, delimit);
00064                         token = strtok(NULL, delimit);
00065                         lectura = (char *)malloc(strlen(token)+1);
00066                         strcpy(lectura, token);
00067                         ACS_SHORT_LOG ((LM_DEBUG, "Retrieved: %s", lectura));
00068                         m_value = atof(lectura);
00069                         free(lectura);
00070                         errcode = 0;
00071                         timestamp = getTimeStamp();
00072                         return m_value;
00073                 }
00074                 
00075                 virtual void write(const T& value, int& errcode, unsigned long long& timestamp)
00076                 {
00077                         ACS_SHORT_LOG ((LM_DEBUG, "Cannot write!"));
00078                         errcode = 0;
00079                         timestamp = getTimeStamp();
00080                         m_value = value;
00081                 }
00082                 
00083         private:
00084                 T m_value;
00085                 SerialRS232 * sp;
00086                 BACIMutex m_serialAccessMutex;
00087 };
